name: Minecraft

userEnvironmentParameters.name: SEED
userEnvironmentParameters.description: If you want to create the Minecraft level with a specific Seed (only Positive Numbers)
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Put in a random Number, e.g 1785852800490497919

userEnvironmentParameters.name: DIFFICULTY
userEnvironmentParameters.description: The difficulty level can be set like peaceful, easy, normal, and hard

userEnvironmentParameters.name: TYP
userEnvironmentParameters.description: What kind of server typ do you want, refer to https://github.com/itzg/docker-minecraft-server/blob/master/README.md
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Enter your server typ here, e.g CATSERVER

description: A Nostr Relay hosted on the Flux Cloud
name: Nostr

userEnvironmentParameters.name: NAME
userEnvironmentParameters.description: Add a custom name to your Nostr Relay
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Please add your custom name here

userEnvironmentParameters.name: DESCRIPTION
userEnvironmentParameters.description: Add a description to your Nostr Relay

userEnvironmentParameters.name: RELAY_URL
userEnvironmentParameters.description: If you want to add your custom domain to this Relay please do so.
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Please respect the WebSocket format, e.g wss://nostr.fluxrelax.com/

userEnvironmentParameters.name: CONTACT
userEnvironmentParameters.description: Add your Email address for people to reach out to you, this is optional!
userEnvironmentParameters.placeholder: Add your email after the syntax mailto:, e.g mailto:flux@gmail.com

userEnvironmentParameters.name: PUB_KEY
userEnvironmentParameters.description: Insert your Nostr Public Key, you can generate one with a Nostr client like https://branle.netlify.app/
